name: Bharath K
top_product: Grey Florican, a premium residential project in Madurai’s Chokkikulam—2, 3, and 3.5 BHK homes, limited to 8 units, under construction now. Next up, we’re bringing the same quality to Chennai’s Mogappair. It’s "Your Smart Home Investment" for families who want the best, built right.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a family looking to buy a home, NRI or an HNI, ready to invest in a RERA-approved project right in the heart of Chennai or Madurai. They want quality, sustainability, and a solid investment—I’m their guy. Let’s make it happen.
top_problem_solved: I’ve noticed that most homebuyers today are looking for three key things when purchasing an apartment: a high UDS (Undivided Share of Land), a limited number of units for better privacy and exclusivity, and a prime location in the heart of the city. That’s exactly why we created Grey Florican—a thoughtfully designed apartment project offering over 50% UDS, limited units, and located in Chokkikulam, one of Madurai’s most sought-after neighborhoods. Grey Florican isn’t just another residential building—it’s everything a modern homeowner is looking for.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is from April 2021 when I stepped into a hardware shop in Madurai, hunting for some project supplies. I started chatting with the owner, a solid guy, and told him I needed a good contractor for a residential job. He connected me to a BNI member he knew—a civil contractor. When I met them, they treated me with real respect, like I mattered. Their work was professional, no shortcuts, and we teamed up to get the job done right. That’s when I saw what BNI really means—people coming together to make things happen.

name: Jeyan R
top_product: Our top products include a cutting-edge VR-based construction simulation tool that enables real-time project planning and training in a fully immersive environment, improving project efficiency and safety. Additionally, we offer VR solutions tailored for business development, creating virtual experiences that streamline client interactions and enhance sales strategies. In the medical industry, our VR learning platforms provide medical professionals with hands-on training in a safe and controlled virtual environment, helping them enhance skills and knowledge without real-world risks.
ideal_referral: Businesses in education, healthcare, construction, or cybersecurity seeking AI-driven solutions, immersive VR experiences, or advanced security measures to innovate and scale effectively.
top_problem_solved: The top problem we’ve solved is optimizing R&D progress across multiple industries, particularly in cybersecurity, business, and construction. In cybersecurity, our AI-driven solutions enable businesses to detect and mitigate emerging threats proactively, reducing vulnerabilities and enhancing system resilience. For business development, we’ve leveraged VR and AI technologies to create immersive customer experiences that streamline sales processes and improve engagement. In the construction industry, our VR-based simulations have optimized project planning and risk management, allowing teams to identify design flaws early, reducing costs, and improving overall project efficiency.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is when a simple referral turned into a long-term partnership, leading to the successful implementation of a VR training module for a client. It not only transformed their employee training but also opened doors for new collaborations in the tech industry

name: MATHIVANAN S
top_product: Our top products include Name Badges for professional identification, offering customization for businesses and events. We also specialize in Vision Eye Charts for medical facilities, ensuring clear and durable signage. Additionally, we provide Customized Backgrounds for businesses, creating unique, branded visual elements that enhance environments like offices, retail spaces, and events. These products are designed to meet the specific needs of our clients while delivering exceptional quality and impact.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business or organization in need of custom signage solutions, whether for branding, wayfinding, or promotional purposes. This could include retail stores, healthcare facilities like hospitals or clinics, educational institutions, or corporate offices. I’m looking for clients who value high-quality, durable signage and are interested in unique, eco-friendly, or digital signage options. These referrals can help them enhance their brand visibility and improve customer experience through professional, impactful signage
top_problem_solved: We solve key problems such as poor brand visibility, lack of effective wayfinding, and outdated or non-compliant signage. Our custom solutions help businesses improve customer experience by ensuring clear navigation and enhancing their brand presence. Additionally, we address the need for durable, high-quality signage that can withstand various environmental conditions, ensuring long-term value and compliance with industry standards. Our focus on innovative and eco-friendly materials also helps clients meet sustainability goals.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI stories is when a fellow member referred me to a local petrol bunk owner who needed new, durable signage for their station. Thanks to the trust and support within the BNI network, I was able to secure the order and deliver high-quality, customized signage that significantly improved the station’s visibility. The project not only boosted the petrol bunk’s branding but also led to additional referrals from other business owners in the area. This experience truly highlights the power of BNI referrals in helping grow my business while fostering lasting relationships.
